abstract: Employees of the American International Group may have been given an implicit ultimatum from Attorney General Andrew M. Cuomo of New York: Give back your bonuses and your names will not be made public.
snippet: Employees of the American International Group may have been given an implicit ultimatum from Attorney General Andrew M. Cuomo of New York: Give back your bonuses and your names will not be made public.
lead_paragraph: Update | 5:51 p.m. Employees of the American International Group may have been given an implicit ultimatum from Attorney General Andrew M. Cuomo of New York: Give back your bonuses or your names will be made public.

headline.main: A.I.G. Memo Hints at Pressure From Cuomo
